summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Emerald Park Addition, being the alley between North 65th Street and North 66th Street from Dayton Avenue to Fremont Avenue; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16467 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
